explanation:
Global Witness is an international NGO that works to break the links between natural resource exploitation, conflict, poverty, corruption, and human rights abuses worldwide. It has worked on diamonds, oil, timber, cocoa, gas, gold and other minerals. It also campaigns to protect human rights defenders targeted because of their work to prevent natural resource exploitation. 

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Global_Witness](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Global_Witness)
[https://www.globalwitness.org/en/](https://www.globalwitness.org/en/)
